name: Devil Engine [DEMO 1]
description:
This version is old! Check out the new version here

Shoot, bomb and burst your way though hoards of enemy craft. Combo off every enemy defeated to increase multiplier and earn tons of points.

The demo for DD14 features the full first level, two shot types, and 3 huge bosses.

NOTE: The DD14 demo has the old name, Shmoop 2. It's still the same game!
A new demo, including the full second level and a reblanaced first level, is scheduled for September.

Controls:

  • Keyboard
    • Arrow keys - move
    • Z - Shoot
    • X - Bomb
    • C - Change speed
    • S - Burst
    • Escape - Pause
  • Controller
    • Dpad or left stick - Move
    • A/X or LB/L1- Shoot
    • B/Circle - Bomb
    • X/Square - Change speed
    • Y/Triangle or RB/R1 - Burst
    • Start/Options - Pause

Follow the game's development over at the game's Tumblr.
